Sentencas: The effect of Zn contents on the microstructure, structural stability and electrical property of BaSn0.5Y0.5-xZnxO2.75-delta (x=0-0.04, BSYZ) were investigated.
Titulo: Effect of Zn contents on the microstructure and electrical properties of BaSn0.5Y0.5-xZnxO2.75 (x=0-0.04)

Sentencas: The small amount of Zn doping (>= 2 mol%) can remarkably decrease the sintering temperature (1350 degrees C) to obtain the dense pellets, and improve the structural stability under wet atmosphere.
Titulo: Effect of Zn contents on the microstructure and electrical properties of BaSn0.5Y0.5-xZnxO2.75 (x=0-0.04)

Sentencas: Zn doping is also favorable to promote the grain growth.
Titulo: Effect of Zn contents on the microstructure and electrical properties of BaSn0.5Y0.5-xZnxO2.75 (x=0-0.04)

Sentencas: The conductivities of samples are strongly dependent on the Zn contents, such as the total and grain boundary conductivities increase with the increase of Zn contents, but the bulk conductivity decreases.
Titulo: Effect of Zn contents on the microstructure and electrical properties of BaSn0.5Y0.5-xZnxO2.75 (x=0-0.04)

Sentencas: The bulk conductivity of BaSn0.5Y0.48Zn0.02O2.75-delta is 1.41 x 10(-3) S/cm(2) at 600 degrees C under wet Ar.
Titulo: Effect of Zn contents on the microstructure and electrical properties of BaSn0.5Y0.5-xZnxO2.75 (x=0-0.04)
Effect of Zn contents on the microstructure and electrical properties of BaSn0.5Y0.5-xZnxO2.75 (x=0-0.04)
